game.title: The Lost Relic quest
game.objective: Recover the Relic of Elders from the Crypt under Moonlight
game.description: A renowned historian, Dr. Evernight, has stumbled upon an ancient crypt that requires a quest to unlock its secrets. The Relic holds crucial knowledge about the lost civilization.

task.objective: Acquire a map to the crypt
task.description: Visit Dr. Evernight's study and obtain the detailed map of the crypt, located in the eastern library.

task.objective: Enter the crypt hidden at nightfall
task.description: Come to the crypt's entrance after dark, which is hidden behind a statue in the crypt's garden.

task.objective: Overcome traps and find the Relic chamber
task.description: Beware of陷阱, solve puzzles to reach the chamber where the Relic awaits.
